functional_units.name: ParseTreeStore Error Handling
functional_units.description: Handles parse tree storage failures by including localized and descriptive error messages for UI exposure.

functional_units.name: ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests Deduplication
functional_units.description: Deduplicates detail emissions during streaming UI updates to prevent over-fulfilling test expectations.

functional_units.name: DocumentSessionController Main-Thread Shortcuts
functional_units.description: Provides main-thread shortcuts in document session control, awaiting parse completion to avoid race conditions with recents bookkeeping.

functional_units.name: Outline View Model Collapse State Persistence
functional_units.description: Respects manual collapse state across rebuilds and aligns accessibility severity strings with formatter expectations.
